resources.string: Always wanted to learn about the universe? We get it - the desire to uncover the mysterious of the great beyond. Learn about exciting missions to the stars in a fun way with this app!

Did you know? One of the best ways to learn is via flashcards. Digest information in bite sized pieces and use the power of active recall to get your brain flexing. You will be impressing your friends in no time!
Ready to test your knowledge? Gain points with high scores and share them on your socials! Find your ranking on the leaderboard
Learn more about the Apollo Mission with NASAs 50 years since Apollo playlist.
Please give us a moment to load
Scroll to the left to view more!
